```py
user> (def svm (train-svm))
#'user/svm
user> (predict svm {:x 0.5 :y 0.5})
0.0
user> (predict svm {:x -0.5 :y 0.5})
0.0
user> (predict svm {:x -0.4 :y 0.4})
0.0
user> (predict svm {:x -0.4 :y -0.4})
1.0
user> (predict svm {:x 0.5 :y -0.5})
1.0
```
